channel.title: My opinion is that
channel.description:
the admins here are a bunch of anally retentive twats. "Oh noes a bit of banter was flamed and the little children might cry and tell their mummys". Jeeze oh, give it up. Free speech dosent exist on forums, I know that. Did i post anything too vulgar? Nope I did not, you guys take it over the line with the moderation which qualifies moparisthebest for the gayest rs forum ever. Which is saying something as you beat even sythe.org and runecms! Holy hell!
And to end my non coherent thread I will say this: Those within the administration team with a stick (or dick if the case may be) up their ass - YOU SUCK.
This will probably deleted by some admin with nothing better to do, but c'est la vie.

item.title: My opinion is that
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Sean:

Freedom of speech protects all speech, even the speech of idiotic racist bastards and neo nazis. Am I really a neo nazi hell bent on killing niggers? Hell no. [br][size=1]Posted at: August 07, 2006, 10:44:59 AM[/size][hr]

This is the new policy, deal with it:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:10, topic:8596”]This is how it is going to work:

  1. I dont care what the picture is, if it is an offtopic picture in a post with no text or spam text, its getting deleted. Period.
  2. If the picture contains images of people being hung, dead people, or pornography, it is getting removed because of the children that browse these forums.

Other than those two, plus common sense, you can post any pictures you want, just dont spam them.[/quote][br][size=1]Posted at: August 09, 2006, 12:46:38 AM[/size][hr][quote=“David, post:67, topic:7495”]Sythe.org, I used to be a mod and very active there. The problem was that you wern’t allowed to say what you wanted to, you’d get banned. I really don’t/can’t rant as I’m on a horrible keyboard. End.

PERFECT EXAMPLE:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I was starting a clean topic, and insted of the mod or admin or whatever deleting the spam post, they locked it.

You need more/better mods that know what to do.

I would have typed more, but this keyboard is horrible.[/quote]

sorry that happend, it has been fixed now

Read full topic

Mopar - I agree 100% with you. Sure, we do have free speech here. If we didn’t why is mopar allowing you to disagree with him? With the right of free speech comes the responsibility of making sure that your free speech doesn’t hurt anyone or offend anyone.
[/quote]
You agree because your like Mopar’s little Dog.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 08, 2006, 02:33:59 AM[/size][hr][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=10488.msg120019#msg120019 date=1154618149]
Xerxes - My comeback is over your mums face, but that’s another story. XxKanexX - Howz about me and you think of some ultimate insult that will make Xerxes cry even more? He got pretty upset when I said his mum wipes his bum…
[/quote]
[size=24pt]Why dont you, mopar and Kane go have butt sex together and shut the fuck up about Xerxes?[/size][/quote]

go die

item.title: My opinion is that
item.dc:creator: @MrWicked MrWicked
item.description:
@MrWicked wrote:

[quote=“sdouble, post:90, topic:7495”][quote author=MrWicked link=topic=10488.msg133246#msg133246 date=1154961645]
Free speech, which I aggree should be aloud to an extent( Posting that picture is a little past my lines but Im not an admin ) ,

I do beleive people should be able to have there own opinions, but this does not mean they must harass the forum members with vulgar images or beleives to prove so. Racism, is the only thing I find unacceptable to post. I wish every racist bastard on here grew up as a jew during the holocast, and see what kind of shit you bring to the world. ( Not saying im Jewish, Im actually caucasian )

Spam, Pointless nonsence that clusters up the forum making it more difficult for the mature users to find there way around and relax while trying to find a thread worth reading.
[/quote]

So you are aware, “Jewish” is a religion, not a race. And yeah, it’s great you’re offended by the racism. And yeah, racism as a whole is not funny. But the ideas for pictures that people get are hilarious. You can’t say you’ve never laughed at a racist joke. It’s basically the same thing as a “dirty” joke, just with a different subject. Like that lollercaust picture. It kills me everytime I see it. I can’t help it, it’s just hilarious. No, I don’t think the hollocaust was funny. No, I don’t think Hitler was a great man. No, I don’t think the KKK is just a group of nice people cleaning up the streets. But I find jokes about all of it humorous. I’m not so uptight and insecure that I just couldn’t possibly find something like that funny.[/quote]
Racism is not acceptable, and I do not find it something that should just be thought of as a joke. Yes, I have laughed at Racist jokes before, but You do not see me on here posting pictures of the KKK hanging blacks, or posting images of the holocost in ASCII form, or images of the KKK kicking someones head into the curb. Wether or not those are real images it is not something I find humorous, there is a difference between telling a harmless joke then parading around spreading hatefull images of injustice and real life events.

Would you get a laugh if I posted the video of a american soldier that was decapitated with a machete while he was still alive? Would that give you guys kicks. It is not something that we should be flaunting around like some huge joke.

Read full topic

( Not saying im Jewish, Im actually caucasian )

Spam, Pointless nonsence that clusters up the forum making it more difficult for the mature users to find there way around and relax while trying to find a thread worth reading.[/quote]

So you are aware, “Jewish” is a religion, not a race. And yeah, it’s great you’re offended by the racism. And yeah, racism as a whole is not funny. But the ideas for pictures that people get are hilarious. You can’t say you’ve never laughed at a racist joke. It’s basically the same thing as a “dirty” joke, just with a different subject. Like that lollercaust picture. It kills me everytime I see it. I can’t help it, it’s just hilarious. No, I don’t think the hollocaust was funny. No, I don’t think Hitler was a great man. No, I don’t think the KKK is just a group of nice people cleaning up the streets. But I find jokes about all of it humorous. I’m not so uptight and insecure that I just couldn’t possibly find something like that funny.

item.title: My opinion is that
item.dc:creator: @Sean Sean
item.description:
@Sean wrote:

Article 19.

  Everyone has the right to freedom of opinion and expression; this right includes freedom to hold opinions without interference and to seek, receive and impart information and ideas through any media and regardless of frontiers.

from the united nations universal declaration of human rights .
"You do know that Freespeech DOES NOT mean that you can say anything you want. " Direct quote from you.

So what does it mean?

MrWicked good for you

Algas oh dont you? Thats why miss silabsoft edited a post of mine (which was pro neo nazi) to : “NO NEO NAZI STUFF PL()X IF YOU HAVNT NOTICED THE WAR IS OVER AND NAZI"S LOTS SO GET OVER IT”

Is that not censorship? ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,10502.msg115914.html#msg115914 )

And to quote adolf hitler
…obstacles do not exist to be surrendered to, but only to be broken.
Adolf Hitler, Mein Kampf
German Nazi dictator, orator, & politician (1889 - 1945)

I SHALL BREAK DOWN THE CORRUPT AND UNFAIR ADMINISTRATION! ZIEG HEIL!

Read full topic
